mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS year, MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ms_article WHERE create_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')), MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC;
